SQL.LOAD: SELECT workqueue_id, company_id, issue_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, company_wrkque_issue_id FROM elp_company_wrkque_issue WHERE company_wrkque_issue_id = :company_wrkque_issue_id
SQL.LOAD_WQ_BY_ISSUE: SELECT workqueue_id, company_id, issue_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, company_wrkque_issue_id FROM elp_company_wrkque_issue WHERE issue_id = :issue_id
SQL.LOAD_WQ_BY_ISSUE_COMPANY: select workqueue_id from elp_company_wrkque_issue where issue_id = :issue_id and company_id = :company_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_company_wrkque_issue SET workqueue_id = :workqueue_id, company_id = :company_id, issue_id = :issue_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE company_wrkque_issue_id = :company_wrkque_issue_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_company_wrkque_issue ( workqueue_id, company_id, issue_id, created_by, company_wrkque_issue_id ) VALUES ( :workqueue_id, :company_id, :issue_id, :created_by, :company_wrkque_issue_id )
